"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a710b86368724c2500007a#post_55a710b86368724c2500007a

It's a breeze once your units are fairly leveled up. The beginning levels are harder than the later ones for this reason.

And hey, if you think that Awaking was hard, think about the older FEs that saved automatically  _after ever single move._ Not to mention that this one didn't even have the damn fog maps.
